name: Snow Angel
description:
Snow Angel is a game about guiding and protecting a baby penguin from the dangers of the outside world. Players manipulate the environment, platforms and other obstacles to ensure the baby penguin, Ziggy, makes it home.

TEAM

  • Sam Zapiain- Producer
  • Josh Delson - Artist
  • Jax Passehl - Programmer
  • Maurice Wesbrooks - Programmer
  • Tabby Hein - Animator/Artist
  • Edgar Camargo - Programmer
